mapper.select: SELECT REPLAY_SEQ ,USER_SEQ ,BOARD_SEQ ,REPLAY_CONTENT ,IFNULL((CASE WHEN INSTR(DATE_FORMAT(LAST_UPDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i'), 'PM') > 0 THEN REPLACE(DATE_FORMAT(LAST_UPDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i'), 'PM', '오후') ELSE REPLACE(DATE_FORMAT(LAST_UPDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i'), 'AM', '오전') END), (CASE WHEN INSTR(DATE_FORMAT(FIRST_UPDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i'), 'PM') > 0 THEN REPLACE(DATE_FORMAT(FIRST_UPDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i'), 'PM', '오후') ELSE REPLACE(DATE_FORMAT(FIRST_UPDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i'), 'AM', '오전') END)) as UPLOAD_DATE FROM REPLY WHERE BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq} ORDER BY FIRST_UPDATE DESC
